import React, { Fragment,useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Spinner from '../layout/Spinner'; import Repos from '../repos/Repos'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; const User = ({ name, company, avatar_url, location, bio, blog, login, html_url, followers, following, public_repos, public_gists, hireable}) => { useEffect(() => { getUser(match.params.login) getUserRepos(match.params.login) },[getUser, getUserRepos]) const {loading} = this.props return ( {loading ? () : ( Back to Search Hireable : {' '} {hireable ? () : () }

{name}

Locaion: {location}

{bio && (

Bio

{bio}

)}
Visit Github Profile

  • {login && ( Username: {login} )}
  • {company && ( Company: {company} )}
  • {blog && ( Website: {blog} )}
Followers: {followers}
Following: {following}
Public Repos: {public_repos}
Public Gists: {public_gists}
) } ) } User.propTypes = { user: PropTypes.object.isRequired, getUser: PropTypes.func.isRequired, loading: PropTypes.bool.isRequired, getUserRepos: PropTypes.func.isRequired, repos: PropTypes.array.isRequired, } export default User
